column4: Hi guys, I would like to setup a mirror to server an internal network, I would like just to have a few packages mostly to a basic installation, I read about apt-cacher and debmirror, but is there a way just to have a ftp with the basic packages ?
apt-mirror? how much in GB were you imagining
any reason not to just use apt-mirror then?
hum... I didn't tried... let me see, thks the help
